    • insertStudent

      public String insertStudent()
      Insert student string. This method constructs the SQLSentence for inserting students using the student attributes
      Returns:
      the string Returns in a String variable the SQLSentence to insert the student obtained with the data of the inserted xml.

    • insertCourse

      public String insertCourse()
      Insert course string. This method constructs the SQLSentence for inserting courses using the student attributes

    • insertSubject

      public String insertSubject()
      Insert subject string. This method constructs the SQLSentence for inserting subjects using the student attributes

      the string Returns in a String variable the SQLSentence to insert the subject obtained with the data of the inserted xml.
